page.title: 19Transport Round Yarlet
page.content: as there are two junctions within a few miles.Businessmen can and do commute as far as Birmingham and beyond yet live locally.House prices are thus higher when near the M6,though if immediately next to it ,they have fallen.One of the complaints of the villagers of Whitgreave was that of the noise of the M6,indeed,when the wind is from the west, this noise can be heard from as much as five miles away.Some local farmers have had their fields cut in two by the road,thuogh they may be joined by a special bridge. Although there are no civil airports in the area we are well served by Manchester,Birmingham and Castle Donnington.Overhead,on a clear day ,the vapour trails of high-flying jets can be seen flying on the North Atlantic to mid-Europe route.Recently
